sentences.english: The sprinklers will remain off when it rains.

Maybe I'll go to hydroponics afterward and run through the sprinklers.

sentences.english: At first it may seem like drinking from a firehouse. It will take some time to get used to it.
sentences.chinese: 首先，它會像消防隊的灑水，需要時間去適應。

sentences.english: This rotary sprinkles is made of opaque material.

sentences.english: The ET-III-W can be used directly on the plating tank to remove rinse spray water and fume scrubber water.
sentences.chinese: 可直接用於對電鍍槽，以消除沖洗灑水和煙氣洗滌水。

sentences.english: We saw a huge vehicle sprinkling water on the street.

sentences.english: Sweeping and water wash-down are other options.

sentences.english: He cannot afford to invest in drip irrigation or sprinkler systems that would lose less water to evaporation.
